SELECT om.REC_ID, om.ORG_CODE, om.ORG_NAME, om.MAJOR_CODE, om.REC_STATUS, om.REMARK, u.NAME AS REC_CREATOR, om.REC_CREATE_TIME FROM SYS_ORG_MAJOR om LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u ON om.REC_CREATOR=u.ID where om.REC_ID=#{id}

SELECT COUNT(REC_ID) FROM SYS_ORG_MAJOR WHERE ORG_CODE=#{orgCode} AND MAJOR_CODE=#{majorCode} AND DELETE_FLAG='0'

ORG_CODE=#{orgCode},
ORG_NAME=#{orgName},
MAJOR_CODE=#{majorCode},
REC_STATUS=#{recStatus},

REC_REVISOR=#{recRevisor}, REC_REVISE_TIME=#{recReviseTime} WHERE REC_ID=#{recId}
mapper.select: SELECT LOGIN_NAME AS "loginName", USER_NAME AS "userName" FROM (SELECT U.LOGIN_NAME, U.NAME AS USER_NAME FROM SYS_USER U WHERE U.USER_ID IN (SELECT t1.USER_ID FROM SYS_USER_ROLE t1 LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE t2 ON t1.ROLE_ID=t2.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER t3 ON t1.USER_ID=t3.LOGIN_NAME WHERE t2.ROLE_CODE=#{groupCname})) WHERE LOGIN_NAME IN (SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT t4.LOGIN_NAME FROM SYS_USER t4 WHERE t4.LOGIN_NAME=t5.LOGIN_NAME) FROM SYS_USER t5 WHERE t5.OFFICE_ID=(SELECT t6.ID FROM SYS_OFFICE t6 WHERE t6.AREA_ID=#{dptCode}))

SELECT t3.NAME AS "userName", t3.LOGIN_NAME AS "loginName" FROM SYS_USER_ROLE t1 LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE t2 ON t1.ROLE_ID=t2.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER t3 ON t1.USER_ID=t3.LOGIN_NAME WHERE 1=1 AND t2.ROLE_CODE='ZCJD' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SYS_USER r1 WHERE r1.LOGIN_NAME=t3.LOGIN_NAME and r1.OFFICE_ID IN (SELECT t6.ID FROM SYS_OFFICE t6 WHERE t6.AREA_ID like '01036%')) ORDER BY t3.ORDER_NUM ASC
